title: WildFly 27.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 27.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about five weeks since the WildFly 27 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 27.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The full list of issues resolved in WildFly 27.0.1 is available . Issues resolved in the WildFly Core update included with WildFly 27.0.1 is available .  Enjoy!
